name: .FPG File Extension
summary: Learn about .FPG files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Graphics file used by compilers and languages including Fenix, Div Games Studio, and Bennu; contains a collection of graphics files and supports image formats such as .PNG, .GIF, .JPG, and .BMP.

content: FPG files are used for packaging graphics for display in "2D" or "2.5D" games.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
